_header: In my grace thou hope not
_description: Reply of Righteousness to Adam — one couplet in a prose sermon

BLRoy18Bxxiii.Transcription:
In my grace þou hope nowȝthfor þou shalte haue as
                    þou haste wrought
BLRoy18Bxxiii.Editions:
Ross,  W. O.,
                        ed.

                xxiii.
